name: Does the resort have transportation to the airport?
answer:
While our hotel does not provide courtesy transportation, there are several options based on the number of travelers in your party.

Please feel free to visit the following links to outside companies with which you may arrange service at your convenience:
Yellow Cab of Charlottesville: 434-295-4131
info@cvilltransportation.com
limo@camry-limo.com
